translation.es: Mallory y yo íbamos sentadas en la nevera.

translation.en: so, like, we had to get up to get people drinks.
translation.es: Debíamos levantarnos para sacar las bebidas.

translation.en: We pulled up to the dock.
translation.es: Llegamos al muelle.

translation.en: We'd gotten there later because it took us so long to get there.
translation.es: Llegamos tarde porque fue un viaje largo.

translation.en: We left the cooler on the boat,
translation.es: Dejamos la nevera en la lancha

translation.en: and we'd go back and forth from the dock to get our alcohol out of the boat.
translation.es: y empezamos a ir y venir por el muelle para bajar el alcohol.

translation.en: There was quite a few people that made the comment,
translation.es: Muchos decían:

translation.en: Hey, this thing got late, you know. It's cold.
translation.es: Ya se hizo tarde. Hace frío.

translation.en: Might not be a very good idea to drive the boat back.
translation.es: Quizá no sea buena idea volver navegando.

translation.en: We had several people offer to drive us.
translation.es: Varias personas se ofrecieron a llevarnos.

translation.en: Leave the boat and they would drive us.
translation.es: Si dejábamos la lancha, nos llevarían.

translation.en: I think Paul was just a little too proud to do that.
translation.es: Creo que Paul era muy orgulloso para hacer eso.

translation.en: Even if someone was to take the keys from Paul and be like,
translation.es: Incluso si alguien le quitaba las llaves a Paul y decía:

translation.en: You're not getting on that boat, Paul would have a conniption.
translation.es: No subirás a esa lancha, le daría un ataque.

translation.en: And Murdaughs don't really get told no much.
translation.es: Y a los Murdaugh no les dicen mucho que no.

translation.en: I know that Miley, Mallory, and I should've been smart enough to just stay.
translation.es: Miley, Mallory y yo debimos habernos quedado.

translation.en: I'll never stop regretting that we didn't.
translation.es: Siempre lamentaré no haberlo hecho.

translation.en: We left around 12:00.
translation.es: Nos fuimos alrededor de las 12.

translation.en: After the oyster roast, me and Connor did get into an argument.
translation.es: Luego del asado de ostras, Connor y yo discutimos.

translation.en: We were arguing about him going to the bar.
translation.es: Discutíamos porque él quería ir al bar.

translation.en: You know, Paul and Connor wanted to make a pit stop
translation.es: Paul y Connor querían hacer una parada técnica,

translation.en: nobody else wanted to make.
translation.es: pero los demás no.

translation.en: Paul wanted to go to the bar,
translation.es: Paul quería ir al bar,

translation.en: and when Paul gets set on something, like, it's gonna happen.
translation.es: y cuando Paul quería hacer algo, lo hacía.

translation.en: There wasn't no talkin' him out of it. There wasn't no stoppin' him.
translation.es: No podíamos disuadirlo. No había nada que lo detuviera.

translation.en: So we actually get to the Day Dock, which is downtown Beaufort.
translation.es: Así que llegamos al Day Dock, en el centro de Beaufort.

translation.en: And we were just waiting for the boys to get back.
translation.es: Estábamos esperando que los chicos volvieran.

translation.en: At that time, Mallory and Anthony were so new
translation.es: Mallory y Anthony salían hacía muy poco

translation.en: and they were in that, like, honeymoon stage.
translation.es: y estaban en una etapa de luna de miel.

translation.en: They were obsessed with each other, and they were on their own little swing.
translation.es: Estaban obsesionados el uno con el otro, en su mundo.

translation.en: Just talkin'.
translation.es: Solo hablando.

translation.en: Miley and I were probably talkin' about how much we hated Paul and Connor.
translation.es: Seguro Miley y yo hablábamos de cuánto odiábamos a Paul y Connor.

translation.en: After leaving Luther's,
translation.es: Cuando salieron de Luther's,

translation.en: Paul comes out and, like, plastic chair right next to him,
translation.es: Paul salió y revoleó una silla de plástico

translation.en: and he just flips the chair over.
translation.es: que estaba junto a él.

translation.en: I remember him, like, comin' back and him just, like,
translation.es: Recuerdo que, mientras regresaba,

translation.en: raising his arms and sprawling his hands.
translation.es: levantaba los brazos y extendía las manos.

translation.en: That's a dead giveaway, pretty much, that he was the whole Timmy alter ego.
translation.es: Era un claro indicio de que era su alter ego, Timmy.

translation.en: He was outta- his- mind drunk.
translation.es: Estaba muy borracho.

translation.en: We had all made it a point to, like, say to him,
translation.es: Todos le decíamos:

translation.en: You need to let Connor drive or you need to let Anthony drive.
translation.es: Deja que conduzcan Connor o Anthony.

translation.en: But he wouldn't listen to anybody.
translation.es: Pero no nos hacía caso.

translation.en: Everyone was like, Paul, don't drive. It's late, it's cold. We wanna get home.
translation.es: Decíamos: Paul, no conduzcas. Es tarde, hace frío. Queremos ir a casa.

translation.en: We talked about gettin' an Uber or somethin'.
translation.es: Pensamos en pedir un Uber o algo así.

translation.en: But, uh, Paul didn't wanna leave his boat there,
translation.es: Pero Paul no quería dejar su lancha allí,

translation.en: didn't trust leavin' his boat there,
translation.es: no confiaba en dejarla allí,

translation.en: and I'm not gonna
translation.es: y yo no iba

translation.en: just leave everybody else, you know?
translation.es: a dejarlos a todos.

translation.en: I'm not gonna leave Connor, Miley, Morgan, Paul.
translation.es: No dejaría a Connor, Miley, Morgan y Paul.

translation.en: We got back on the boat to go home.
translation.es: Volvimos a la lancha para irnos a casa.

translation.en: Everyone was like, Paul, don't drive, and Paul would snap back and be like,
translation.es: Todos decían: Paul, no conduzcas, y Paul respondía con:

translation.en: Well, this is my fucking boat, and I know this river,
translation.es: Es mi maldita lancha, y conozco este río,

translation.en: and you're not driving my boat.
translation.es: no conducirán mi lancha.

translation.en: The way Paul was driving was honestly terrifying.
translation.es: Paul conducía de forma aterradora.

translation.en: The boat was just steady makin' circles.
translation.es: La lancha hacía círculos.

translation.en: We were just round and round, zigzaggin', arguin', you know.
translation.es: Dábamos vueltas y vueltas, zigzagueando y discutiendo.

translation.en: Everybody's mad.
translation.es: Todos estaban enojados.

translation.en: Paul would just leave the wheel unattended.
translation.es: Paul soltaba el timón.

translation.en: Connor would have to grab it.
translation.es: Connor debía ir y agarrarlo.

translation.en: I literally stood up and yelled at him,
translation.es: Así que me paré y le grité:

translation.en: If you're not gonna let anybody else drive, take us home.
translation.es: Si no dejarás que nadie conduzca, llévanos a casa.

translation.en: He got in my face and pointed at me, like,
translation.es: Se me acercó y me señaló:

translation.en: You just need to shut the fuck up and sit down.
translation.es: Solo cállate y siéntate.

translation.en: Anthony was getting extremely pissed.
translation.es: Anthony se estaba enojando mucho.

translation.en: I yelled at Paul, Morgan, Miley, Connor. I yelled at all of 'em.
translation.es: Les grité a Paul, Morgan, Miley, Connor. Les grité a todos.

translation.en: Paul is yelling at me and he's like, Why don't you have my back?
translation.es: Paul me gritaba y me decía: ¿Por qué no me defiendes?.

translation.en: And I was like, Why would I have your back?
translation.es: ¿Por qué te defendería?.

translation.en: You're screaming at us and you're not making sense.
translation.es: Nos estás gritando y estás siendo absurdo.

translation.en: You're acting crazy.
translation.es: Estás actuando como loco.

translation.en: And he looked at me and he said,
translation.es: Entonces, me miró y dijo:

translation.en: You know what's crazy?
translation.es: ¿Sabes qué es loco?

translation.en: Your father not making enough money to support your family.
translation.es: Que tu papá no gane dinero para mantener a tu familia.

translation.en: I started crying, and that's when, uh, Paul got in my face,
translation.es: Comencé a llorar, y Paul se me acercó

translation.en: and he just started screaming, and, uh,
translation.es: y empezó a gritar, y…

translation.en: that's when Paul slapped me.
translation.es: entonces me abofeteó.

translation.en: Then, um…
translation.es: Después…

translation.en: Sorry.
translation.es: Lo siento.

translation.en: You know, you could tell by the way he did it that it wasn't the first time.
translation.es: Por cómo lo hizo, se notaba que no era la primera vez.

translation.en: It’s just heartbreaking to see one of your best friends be abused
translation.es: Fue desgarrador ver que agredían a una de tus mejores amigas

translation.en: in front of your face.
translation.es: frente a ti.

translation.en: I was like, You can't hide it anymore from any of us. Like, this is not okay.
translation.es: Le dije: Ya no nos lo puedes ocultar. Esto no está bien.

translation.en: At that moment in time, everybody was like, You know what?
translation.es: En ese momento, todos dijimos:

translation.en: Let's just go.
translation.es: Vámonos.

translation.en: You know, we went from that idle to…
translation.es: Pasamos de no hacer nada a…

translation.en: The bow of the boat stood up.
translation.es: La proa de la lancha se levantó.

translation.en: He would just leave the wheel when we were goin' full speed.
translation.es: Paul soltaba el timón cuando íbamos a toda velocidad.

translation.en: Connor would just reach over there from the side and straighten the wheel up.
translation.es: Connor debía agarrarlo desde el costado para enderezarlo.

translation.en: Connor came up to me and he told me he loved me,
translation.es: Connor se me acercó y me dijo que me amaba,

translation.en: and I could tell, like, he was gettin' scared too.
translation.es: se notaba que también se estaba asustando.

translation.en: Miley screaming, Connor, Connor, and I felt her grab me.
translation.es: Miley gritaba: Connor, Connor, y sentí que me agarraba.

translation.en: I slid down.
translation.es: Me resbalé.

translation.en: I put my feet up, pulled Mallory to me.
translation.es: Levanté los pies y jalé a Mallory hacia mí.

translation.en: I was looking at this bridge and I was like, We're about to hit this.
translation.es: Vi que había un puente y pensé: Vamos a chocarlo.

translation.en: I heard a scream, then I was out.
translation.es: Escuché un grito y me caí.

translation.en: Everything was going crazy. People were screaming.
translation.es: Fue una locura. Todos gritaban.

translation.en: - As soon as I got on the bank… -
translation.es: Apenas llegué a la orilla,

translation.en: …Miley came runnin' straight up to me and asked, Where's Mallory?
translation.es: Miley vino corriendo y dijo: ¿Dónde está Mallory?.

translation.en: Then that's when we all started screamin' for Mallory.
translation.es: Y todos empezamos a llamar a Mallory.

translation.en: Mallory!
translation.es: ¡Mallory!

translation.en: Where the fuck is Mallory?
translation.es: ¿Dónde diablos está Mallory?

translation.en: Anthony stayed in the water as long as he could.
translation.es: Anthony se quedó en el agua todo lo que pudo.

translation.en: He would come up. He would go down.
translation.es: Salía. Se sumergía.

translation.en: I jumped back in the water over and over and over.
translation.es: Saltaba al agua una y otra vez.

translation.en: The water under the bridge, it was goin' so fast.
translation.es: El agua debajo del puente corría muy rápido.

translation.en: I was goin' against the current. There you are, scared for your life.
translation.es: Yo iba contra la corriente. Ahí estaba, temía por mi vida.

translation.en: It's either do or die.
translation.es: O hacía algo o moría.

translation.en: I just remember wakin' up.
translation.es: Recuerdo cuando desperté.

translation.en: First thing I could do was just get on my phone and call 911.
translation.es: Lo primero que pude hacer fue llamar al 911.

translation.en: 911, where's your emergency?
translation.es: 911, ¿dónde es su emergencia?

translation.en: We're in a boat crash on Archers Creek.
translation.es: Chocamos con la lancha en Archers Creek.

translation.en: You're by the bridge?
translation.es: ¿Están junto al puente?

translation.en: There's only one bridge in Archers Creek.
translation.es: El único puente en Archers Creek.

translation.en: Did you crash into the bridge?
translation.es: ¿Chocaron contra el puente?

translation.en: We're under the only bridge in Archers Creek.
translation.es: Estamos bajo el único puente de Archers Creek.

translation.en: All right, so you're under the bridge, okay.
translation.es: Bien, están debajo del puente.

translation.en: Mallory! Mallory!
translation.es: ¡Mallory!

translation.en: Please send someone.
translation.es: Envíen a alguien.

translation.en: No, we're comin', okay?
translation.es: Ya vamos, ¿sí?

translation.en: I walked up to the top of the bridge.
translation.es: Caminé hasta la cima del puente.

translation.en: I remember seein' blue lights comin' from both directions.
translation.es: Recuerdo que vi luces azules acercarse de ambas direcciones.

translation.en: It was cops that came first.
translation.es: Primero llegó la policía.

translation.en: The one missing is a female.
translation.es: Se perdió una mujer.

translation.en: I just sat in the boat, bleeding.
translation.es: Me senté en la lancha, sangrando.

translation.en: It hurts! It fucking hurts!
translation.es: ¡Duele! ¡Duele, carajo!

translation.en: So the cop that came up to me, he's like, You're gonna be okay.
translation.es: Un policía me dijo: Vas a estar bien.

translation.en: He kept patting my back, and I was like, Tell me y'all found Mallory.
translation.es: Quería calmarme, y yo le dije: Dime que encontraron a Mallory.

translation.en: And he said, No, we haven't found Mallory yet.
translation.es: Y respondió: No, aún no encontramos a Mallory.

translation.en: I remember my face bein' really warm.
translation.es: Recuerdo que tenía la cara muy caliente.

translation.en: My bottom teeth were in front of my front teeth.
translation.es: Tenía los dientes de abajo frente a los de arriba.

translation.en: I knew somethin' wasn't right.
translation.es: Sabía que algo andaba mal.

translation.en: Paul was only in his underwear,
translation.es: Paul estaba en ropa interior

translation.en: and his only concern was calling his granddad.
translation.es: y su única preocupación era llamar a su abuelo.

translation.en: - Can I use your phone? - I ain't got my phone on me.
translation.es: ¿Puedo usar su teléfono? No lo tengo conmigo.

translation.en: You ain't got your phone?
translation.es: ¿No tiene su teléfono?

translation.en: No, you dropped yours in the grass back there.
translation.es: No, el tuyo se te cayó en el césped.

translation.en: That don't surprise me.
translation.es: No me sorprende.

translation.en: I remember Anthony just like, You did this. This is all your fault.
translation.es: Recuerdo que Anthony dijo: Tú hiciste esto. Es tu culpa.

translation.en: Bo, you fuckin' smilin' like it's fuckin' funny?
translation.es: Bo, ¿estás sonriendo como si fuera gracioso?

translation.en: Sit down.
translation.es: Siéntate.

translation.en: My fuckin' girlfriend's gone, Bo!
translation.es: ¡Mi maldita novia desapareció, Bo!

translation.en: Hope you rot in fuckin' hell!
translation.es: ¡Espero que te pudras en el infierno!

translation.en: He's just agitated.
translation.es: Está muy alterado.

translation.en: It took them 15 to 20 minutes to get Paul to actually get in the ambulance.
translation.es: Tardaron entre 15 y 20 minutos en hacer que Paul entrara a la ambulancia.

translation.en: And he's not really responding to me or any of us.
translation.es: Y no me respondía a mí ni a ninguno de nosotros.

translation.en: Once we were actually on our way, Paul called his granddad and was like,
translation.es: Cuando estábamos en camino, Paul llamó a su abuelo y dijo:

translation.en: Yeah, we were in a boat accident. Like, Oh yeah, they can't find Mallory.
translation.es: Sí, tuvimos un accidente. Y: No encuentran a Mallory.

translation.en: And was just like, It was Cotton Top that did it.
translation.es: Fue culpa de Cotton Top.

translation.en: Cotton Top is Connor's nickname.
translation.es: A Connor le decimos Cotton Top.

translation.en: I was like, Really?
translation.es: Yo pensé: ¿En serio?.

translation.en: I wanted to beat the shit out of him, because I wasn't drivin'.
translation.es: Quería darle una paliza, porque yo no conducía.

translation.en: Mom, y'all need to come to Beaufort, quick.
translation.es: Mamá, deben venir a Beaufort, rápido.

translation.en: Obviously, when you get a call in the middle of the night,
translation.es: Cuando te llaman en medio de la noche,

translation.en: you know something's wrong.
translation.es: sabes que algo anda mal.

translation.en: What if she's at the bottom of the river, man?
translation.es: ¿Y si está en el fondo del río?

translation.en: All he could say is, We can't find Mallory.
translation.es: Solo dijo: No encontramos a Mallory.

translation.en: They can't find Mallory. And I said, We're comin'.
translation.es: No encuentran a Mallory. Y respondí: Ya vamos.

translation.en: We'll be there. We're comin' as fast as we can.
translation.es: Iremos lo más rápido posible.

translation.en: We've got water search and rescue out.
translation.es: Está el equipo de búsqueda y rescate en el agua.

translation.en: The Parris Island Fire Department's out.
translation.es: Vinieron los bomberos de Parris Island.

translation.en: They've all got their water assets out there looking.
translation.es: Su personal acuático la está buscando.

translation.en: Anthony kept sayin',
translation.es: Anthony decía:

translation.en: Has somebody called Mr. Phillip?
translation.es: ¿Llamaron al señor Phillip?.

translation.en: Has somebody called Miss Renee?
translation.es: ¿Llamaron a Renee?.

translation.en: Do it right now, because they need to know.
translation.es: Háganlo ahora, tienen que saberlo.

translation.en: Last name's Beach. Melanie? Mallory?
translation.es: ¿El apellido es Beach? ¿Melanie? ¿Mallory?

translation.en: I was just askin' about Mallory's family.
translation.es: Les pregunté por la familia de Mallory.

translation.en: I do have phone numbers, but I don't wanna make that phone call,
translation.es: Tengo sus teléfonos, pero no quiero llamarlos yo,

translation.en: and I don't know…
translation.es: y no sé…
